description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes;

Effect Your familiar summons winds that speed up and protect you. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. When you Stride this turn, you don't trigger reactions. In addition, you don't need to Stride before a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] this turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Path of the Tempest]

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
